attributes.action: We Want a No Deal Brexit
attributes.additional_details: With no deal we do not have any obligation to pay them the 40 billion that they are demanding while they are offering nothing decent in return and that money can be put to much better use spent on the NHS instead. If no deal causes short to medium term issues after we have left on the 29th March 2019 then so be it as this is a price worth paying to avoid having a bad deal in the longer term.
attributes.background: The EU have made very clear that they not willing to give us any compromises, do not respect where our red lines are and want to give us a bad deal out of spite. Their demands are unacceptable and no deal at all is better than a bad deal.
